resources.string: Select a network to view while collecting data:

When you select a network, you are choosing which one to see in the map view. The app will collect data on all visible networks in the background. If you wish to not collect data on a particular network, you will need to blacklist the network.
The strength of the indicated Wi-Fi
An indicator showing if a previous record eists for the indicated network SSID
A button for getting options about the network
Delete all data about this network
Don\'t collect data about this network
